subject: [junit] Re: one time setUp and tearDown
msgSnippet: I have used one time setup and teardown when testing tools that work on directories and files.  I want a know set of directories and files (and for a backup
messageBody:
I have used one time setup and teardown when testing tools that work on directories and files. I want a know set of directories and files (and for a backup tool the dates). I don't see the value in setup/teardown for each unit test. This assumes the tool/tests do not change the setup.

The only problem was "tricking" junit to allow this. I could have done this in ant but sometimes, during developement I use jedit and junit and not ant.

I would like junit to support a onetime setup/teardown for some types of tools, although it is possible I would get lazy and use in when I shouldn't.

jeb
